ValidationRule.description: Benefit Option does not match medical approval. Check to make sure option is correct or see Medical UW Team.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND ( NEPs_Complete__c > DATE (2019,01,10), ISPICKVAL(Medical_Option__c,'Paychex Agency')|| ISPICKVAL(Medical_Option__c,'Paychex Agency with PBS Non Medical') || ISPICKVAL(Medical_Option__c,'Self-Retained')|| ISPICKVAL(Medical_Option__c,'Self-retained Medical with PBS Non Medical'), ISPICKVAL(Initial_Medical_UW_Approval__c, "Approved")|| ISPICKVAL(Initial_Medical_UW_Approval__c, "Approved Dual Bands")|| ISPICKVAL(Initial_Medical_UW_Approval__c, "Approved for Non-Medical/Not Offering")|| ISPICKVAL(Initial_Medical_UW_Approval__c,"") )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Benefit Option does not match Initial Medical approval. Check to make sure option is correct or see Medical UW Team.
